Title: Lootera
Writer: O. Henry (short story "The Last Leaf"), Bhavani Iyer (screenplay), Anurag Kashyap (dialogue), Vikramaditya Motwane (screenplay)
Actors: Ranveer Singh, Sonakshi Sinha, Barun Chanda, Adil Hussain
Plot: An aristocrat's daughter falls in love with a visiting archaeologist, but he holds a secret that could drive them apart.
